name: 幻兽骑士
description:
In the kingdom of the Phantom Knights, the mysterious and magnificent star spiritual energy of nature gave birth to humans and green dwarves. At the beginning of the story, the two tribes also had close ties and affection. They each selected the most outstanding and powerful knights within their tribe, and worked together to explore this vast but perilous wilderness of another world, ultimately establishing the Star Dome Knight Kingdom. However, one day, many treasure chests fell from the sky, which was not a gift from heaven, but Pandora's magic box. After prying open the treasure chest, people were surprised to find many valuable and powerful equipment treasures inside. The seeds of greed gradually spread and sprouted, and many people of the Knight Kingdom violated their original creed of "vowing to maintain the unity of the kingdom and world peace to the death.". In order to profit from the treasure chest, they plundered not only the chest but also their lives recklessly.

A young knight found an ancient prophecy parchment note in an inconspicuous wooden box next to the ruins of his ancestors. He gently brushed away the dust, carefully read the text on it, and slowly read, "Go find the sword that emits a rainbow like halo, you will end the infinite chain of this dispute." Brave knight, the boy who found the rainbow light in the treasure chest, could it be you?

[Game features]
As newcomers to the Knights, the first gameplay that knights encounter is blind box unboxing. By opening the treasure chest, the knight can quickly obtain equipment that can enhance his combat power and arm himself. As more and more treasure chests are opened, the knights will constantly eliminate old equipment and sell it. The gold coins obtained during this process can be used to upgrade the treasure chests and increase the probability of obtaining top-notch equipment; Or enhance the cool cloak to make your little knight stronger.

In addition to their adventures on the continent of the early Knight Kingdom, knights gradually became exposed to various other types of looting and combat system gameplay. Territory plundering not only allows for the collection of massive resources, but also triggers intense battles between knights. And through the Peak Arena, everyone can compete with excellent knights from all over the world, using their solid combat power to win the championship!

Of course, it doesn't matter if you're tired of adventure. The Knights Continent also has a variety of leisure and entertainment gameplay that can relax the body and mind of the knights. Leisure "fishing" gameplay can help you obtain rich fishing catch. Collecting fishing guides may make you the next king of fishing. The "Dance Companion" gameplay allows you to easily make vows with multiple cute girls, further enhancing your attribute combat power, and your unbreakable bonds will become the foundation of victory.
